name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of April 27, a residential building in Harbin Kang'an Community suddenly cracked and tilted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 26, Cixi City, Zhejiang Province. An employee of Ningbo Cixi Wellcome Technology Factory died, and his family members threw paper money outside the factory gate to defend their rights.
According to the family members, the employee died in the company dormitory on April 21 after working overtime for a long time. He was not found until the next day. The factory ignored it, refused to provide the surveillance footage and attendance records of the deceased before his death, and denied the fact that he worked on Sunday before his death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 26, in Yuncheng, Shanxi, a Huawei Wenjie M7 electric car rear-ended a water truck and caught fire, killing three people. According to the family members of the deceased, the AEB was not activated, the A-pillar was deformed, the airbag did not pop out, and the door could not be opened. Two of them were burned to death in the car. My rights protection video and pictures were deleted.
Then it triggered a relay forwarding by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 26, Fuzhou, Fujian. A woman said that her husband was serving a sentence in Fuzhou Correctional Institution. She received a call from the prison at 8 a.m. on the 24th, and the other party told her that her husband was being rescued in the hospital. After learning the situation, the woman rushed to the hospital with her family. On the way, the staff of the juvenile detention center kept emphasizing that he was being rescued.
When the woman and her group rushed to the hospital to check on her husband, they were stopped by the staff of the juvenile detention center. After the woman knelt down and begged constantly, the other party told the woman the truth that her husband's body had been sent to the funeral home.
Then the woman rushed to the funeral home and saw her husband who was already lying in the coffin. The woman said that her husband was only 32 years old and in good health, but her husband's body was purple from neck to head, and the nails of all ten fingers were dark purple. After forensic identification, it was considered to be livor mortis, but the woman questioned that livor mortis could not appear in such a short time. The woman also said that the prison police had not given any explanation since the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video is about: "This is my younger brother, this is my younger brother, he is only 32 years old. Where is he from? We are from No. 117, Village XYZ, Dongjiao Town, Putian City, Fujian Province (didn't hear clearly). Why did he come to this prison? He was arrested for playing the Mark Six lottery. There was no other way. He was arrested in 2021. They arrested him on January 13, 2022. The physical examination was fine and they put him in. They put him in. They called us on the morning of April 24, 2024...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 26, Yang Xiaoming, the "Father of Sinopharm Vaccines" and former chief engineer and chief scientist of Sinopharm Group, was removed from his position as a NPC deputy for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.
During the epidemic, Yang Xiaoming led the team to develop and market China's first inactivated coronavirus vaccine, and was hailed as the "Father of Sinopharm Vaccines". In September 2020, he was awarded the title of "National Advanced Individual in the Fight against the COVID-19 Epidemic" by the Chinese government.
Sinopharm Group's inactivated vaccine is one of the main vaccines that Chinese people have received during the coronavirus. However, the effectiveness of this vaccine in dealing with the more contagious variant of Omicron was questioned at the time.
A study published by Chinese researchers in The Lancet in June 2022 pointed out that Sinopharm vaccines are poorly effective against Omicron, and even after two doses of the vaccine, the relevant antibodies are almost undetectable; but after a booster dose, the antibodies can be partially restored.
Zhang Zhizhong believes that it is currently impossible to determine whether Yang Xiaoming has committed serious violations of discipline...
fullContent:
4月26日，中国“国药疫苗之父”，国药集团原总工程师、首席科学家杨晓明，因涉嫌严重违纪违法被罢免人大代表职务。
在疫情期间，杨晓明曾率领团队研发上市了中国首款冠病灭活疫苗，被誉为“国药疫苗之父”。在2020年9月获中国官方颁发“全国抗击新冠肺炎疫情先进个人”。
国药集团的灭活疫苗是中国民众在冠病期间接种的主要疫苗之一。不过，这款疫苗当时在应对传染性较强的奥密克戎变异株时的成效受到质疑。
中国科研人员2022年6月在《柳叶刀》杂志发表的一项研究指出，国药疫苗对奥密克戎效力差，即使接种了两剂疫苗，也几乎测不出相关抗体；但在接种一剂加强剂后，能部分恢复抗体。
张执中认为，目前无法确定杨晓明的严重违纪违法行为是否与疫苗研发直接关联，但由于这些事情都跟他有关，虚报疫苗成效或是外界揣测的方向之一。
不过，张执中预计，若杨晓明的严重违纪违法行为涉及到疫苗，可能触及敏感的疫情管理问题，当局或许不会披露更多详情。
公开资料显示，国药集团在2021年营收超7000亿元（人民币，下同，约1343亿新元）、利润破千亿，在世界500强排行榜中位列第80位，居全球制药企业之首。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens' comments on Tian Fuzhen's report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 28, the official WeChat account and Bilibili account of the famous free e-book website Zlibrary issued a statement, announcing that access from mainland China would be blocked from that day on. It also promised to implement a series of speech review measures in coordination with the mainland to screen books before reopening.
In the comment section, the account admitted that the operator was interviewed by the Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 27, Zhongluotan Town, Baiyun District, Guangzhou City was hit by a tornado, which caused 5 deaths, 33 injuries, and damaged 141 factories.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, Yang Yang, who was sued by Pinduoduo for 450,000 yuan in April for non-compete agreements, said that he rejected Pinduoduo's proposal to withdraw arbitration in exchange for the return of 15,000 yuan in non-compete compensation. He said that even if he lost the lawsuit, he would continue to sue and did not believe that Pinduoduo could cover the sky with one hand. He also revealed that he was threatened by the company's leaders, followed and secretly photographed by the company's people, and teachers at his alma mater were also harassed. At the end of the article, he wrote: Compared with you capitalists, I have no money. But I am also a human being, just like you, I have parents, teachers and classmates, and I have dignity. When you pressed me to the ground and rubbed me, you ate hot pot and sang songs. Now you pull up your pants and run away. Do you still want me to greet you with a smile and send you out?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many Shanghai citizens have reported online that Shanghai is strictly cracking down on people who do not wear seat belts in the back seat of an online ride-hailing car. According to a Shanghai citizen, if caught for the first time, they will be given a warning, if caught for the second time, they will be fined 30 yuan, and for the third time and above, each time will be fined 50 yuan. Many citizens have posted the tickets issued by the traffic police online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/5GKxUyzchl

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 27, Chongqing. Two women in kimonos dancing outside the Nanbin Road Expo Center sparked public outrage and were stopped and condemned by citizens, during which a physical conflict broke out between the two sides.
Angry citizens restrained the women and shouted, "Don't leave! Spy! Call the police!"
On the 28th, the local police station responded that they were aware of the incident and had dispatched police yesterday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 27 (Release) Linyi, Shandong. Mr. Li from Tancheng County reported that on the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, the police station drove a police car to the village with a loudspeaker and called him by name, saying that he was suspected of soliciting prostitution.
Mr. Li said that he did not engage in prostitution as they said. But it would not sound good if such a thing were spread, whether it was true or not, so Mr. Li wanted to pay money to settle the matter. The local police officer told Mr. Li that he could be taken care of, but Mr. Li said that he did not need to be taken care of, and that he was willing to take the money but was not really soliciting prostitution.
Mr. Li was then detained in the detention room for 24 hours, and later the summons was posted on Mr. Li's door, and Mr. Li's mother was warned not to remove it. Until the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, the police car entered the village and shouted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, Wenjie Auto released a statement to express condolences to the victims, and stated that the vehicle was traveling at 115 km/h when the accident occurred, the airbags were deployed normally, and the power battery pack characteristics were normal. It is currently actively cooperating with the local traffic police department to conduct an accident investigation and provide all possible support to the family members.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chongqing Joint Investigation Team released the final investigation results of the "gas meter running fast" incident: 754 gas meters have been calibrated so far, and only 2 of them run fast. Without adding other gases, smart gas and electricity meters cannot rewrite gas consumption remotely or through chips.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xiaoyang is a student at Columbia University. During the event to support the Gaza camp that started on April 17, she witnessed everything on the scene and served as part of the human wall to protect the students.
What are the Columbia students protesting?
What is the difference between the protests of American college students and the White Paper Movement in China?
How does she view the reversal of public opinion in the Chinese community?
Today, Xiaoyang talks about her views as an eyewitness

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 28, a cryptocurrency blogger said that he was investigated by the police for participating in the perpetual contract rebate of BKEX (Bitcoin Exchange), and he has returned the stolen money and been released on bail.
At the same time, he said that the perpetual contract leverage commonly seen in the cryptocurrency circle is now defined as online gambling, and KOL rebates are regarded as casino accomplices. Corresponding criminal penalties will be imposed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 27, Building No. 10, which was tilted as a whole, was demolished overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 27 (Released) Shanghai. Shop owners near the Dongjiangyin Street Vegetable Market protested against demolition and worked together to push down the fences outside the shops.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 27, Harbin, Heilongjiang. The villagers of Daluo Village reported that the village secretary forcibly withheld 47.22 million yuan in land compensation and forcibly seized the people's land. On the same day, the villagers went to the scene to stop the excavator from operating.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zlibrary officials reminded self-media in the comment section to delete posts about Zlibrary in a timely manner. Failure to delete the posts may result in the risk of being summoned for questioning/being involved in criminal charges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 28, Shanghai. Professor Zhang Yongzhen's Donghua Institute of Pathogenic Biology was closed by the Shanghai Public Health Center. Students held banners outside the laboratory to protest their rights and demanded the resumption of normal scientific research. During the period, they were stabilized by the police and security guards. The two sides had physical confrontations and some students fell to the ground while protesting. That night, Professor Zhang Yongzhen rushed back to the laboratory and led the students to sit outside the laboratory door to continue to fight with the Public Health Center. It is reported that during the epidemic, Professor Zhang Yongzhen led the team to decipher and publish the full genome sequence of the new coronavirus.
On April 27, a student in the laboratory, "Nian Nian Zai Zai", posted a post explaining the whole story of the incident. He said that the Public Health Center unilaterally asked Professor Zhang Yongzhen and his team to move out of the laboratory within two days without any communication. Because this incident not only affected the progress of the individual graduation project, but also damaged the interests of the team, so they decided to expose the matter.
"Nian Nian Zai Zai Zai" said that in 2018...
fullContent:
4月28日，上海。张永振教授的东华病原生物学研究所被上海公卫中心关闭，学生们在实验室外拉横幅维权，要求恢复正常科研工作，期间遭到公安和保安的维稳，双方发生肢体中途，有学生在维权中倒地。当天晚上，张永振教授赶回实验室，带领学生们坐在实验室门外继续和公卫中心抗争。据悉， 疫情期间， 张永振教授带领团队率先破译并公布了新冠病毒全基因组序列。
 4月27日，实验室一名学生“年年在搬家”发帖解释了整个事件的来龙去脉，他称公卫中心在没有任何沟通的情况下，单方面要求张永振教授及其团队在两日内搬离实验室。因为此事不仅影响了个人毕业的课题进度，还损害了团队利益，于是决定将此事曝光。
 “年年在搬家”称，2018年3月底，上海公卫中心与张永振教授团队正式达成为期5年的科研合作协议，原协议规定张永振在公卫中心的工作将于2023年3月结束，但2022年10月31日下午，公卫中心负责人告诉张永振教授合作协议到期，从11月1日起将不再合作。11月2日下午，公卫中心发给张永振教授一份该有公章的书面通知函，通知张永振教授团队终止协议，并要求张永振教授及其团队限期离开。11月9日， 张永振教授做出回复，表示团队与公卫中心的协议并未到期，希望对方履行协议中的责任义务。
  2020年2月，上海公卫中心向中国疾病预防控制中心传染预防控制所发商调函，商调张老师来上海公卫中心工作。但截至目前公卫中心仍没有办理张永振教授入职，导致张永振教授成为了事实上的失业者，无法正常享受公费医疗等保障。而为了顾全大局，维护党的形象，张永振教授至今都没有办理失业证明。
 “年年在搬家”还透露，团队为新冠溯源做出了大量贡献，而公卫中心书记范小红却不断给团队制造麻烦，2021年中下旬多次停发，张永振教授报酬，同时克扣拨协议规定的700万元科研经费，导致团队无法正常进行科研活动。除此之外，范小红还利用职权把别人的科研课题据为己有，争夺没有实质贡献的论文通讯作者，以此获得更多名利。不仅如此，范小红还免除团队宋志刚老师p3实验室负责人职务，并全权接管实验室，但“年年在搬家”质疑范小红的专长为肺癌治疗，“一个完全不懂病原学研究的人竟要直接管理生物安全p3实验室，究竟意欲何为？”
 截至目前发文，该篇文章已被平台删除，据团队学生于28日21时58分发布的照片显示，张永振教授仍躺在实验室门外，身后还有两名保安看守。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Professor Zhang Yongzhen chose to sleep outside the laboratory door tonight as a protest.
